mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT study_type.type_id, study_type.type_name FROM study_type, user_studytype, login_status WHERE study_type.type_id IN ( SELECT user_studytype.stu_type FROM user_studytype WHERE user_studytype.username = ( SELECT username FROM login_status WHERE login_status.username = #{username} AND login_status.`status` = 0 ) )
